description.base: The targeted friendly creature is touched by the caster and gains Damage Reduction against Fire, Cold, Electrical, or Acid damage for 5 to 10 rounds.  5 plus 1 per two caster levels are absorbed from each attack of the specified damage type.

upgrades.ResistSpells: With Resist Spells, the targeted creature now also gains spell resistance of 15 points plus 1 point per caster level.
